languages.text: [Соврать] "Никак не успокоишься, что Аребенниан прервал твой суд, Назракей? Заставляешь Опустошительную бурю делать грязную работу и идти против воли Аребенниан, который помог Маражаю уйти из Комморры?!"

traits.locale_text: "Эй, Караэль? Тебе говорит что-то слово "Аребенниан"? Знаешь, кто помог Маражаю уйти из Комморры?"

languages.text: [Lie] "Still smarting from the Arebennian interrupting your trial, Nazrakhei? Are you making the Reaving Tempest do your dirty work and go against the Arebennian's will, even though it was he who helped Marazhai escape Commorragh?"
languages.original_text: [Соврать] "Никак не успокоишься, что Аребенниан прервал твой суд, Назракей? Заставляешь Опустошительную бурю делать грязную работу и идти против воли Аребенниан, который помог Маражаю уйти из Комморры?!"

traits.locale_text: [Lie] "Still cannot get over Arebennian interrupting your trial, Nazrakhei? Are you making the Reaving Tempest do the dirty job and go against Arebennian's will though it was he who helped Marazhai escape Commorragh?!"

[Lie] "Still cannot get over Arebennian interrupting your trial, Nazrakhei? Are you making the Reaving Tempest do the dirty job and go against Arebennian's will though it was he who helped Marazhai escape Commorragh?!"

[Lie] "Still smarting from the Arebennian interrupting your trial, Nazrakhei? Are you making the Reaving Tempest do your dirty work and go against the Arebennian's will, even though it was he who helped Marazhai escape Commorragh?"

[Lie] "Still smarting from the Arebennian interrupting your trial, Nazrakhei? Are you making the Reaving Tempest do your dirty work and go against the Arebennian's will, even though it was he who helped Marazhai escape Commorragh?"

[Lie] "Still smarting from the Arebennian interrupting your trial, Nazrakhei? Are you making the Reaving Tempest do your dirty work and go against the Arebennian's will, even though it was he who helped Marazhai escape Commorragh?"

languages.text: [Lügen] "Schmerzt es Euch noch immer, dass der Arebennian Euren Prozess unterbrochen hat, Nazrakhei? Lasst Ihr den plündernden Sturm Eure Drecksarbeit machen und sich dem Willen des Arebennian widersetzen, obwohl er es war, der Marazhai bei der Flucht aus Commorragh geholfen hat?"
languages.original_text: [Lie] "Still smarting from the Arebennian interrupting your trial, Nazrakhei? Are you making the Reaving Tempest do your dirty work and go against the Arebennian's will, even though it was he who helped Marazhai escape Commorragh?"

traits.locale_text: [Lügen] "Schmerzt es Euch noch immer, dass der Arebennian Euren Prozess unterbrochen hat, Nazrakhei? Lasst Ihr den plündernden Sturm Eure Drecksarbeit machen und sich dem Willen des Arebennian widersetzen, obwohl er es war, der Marazhai bei der Flucht aus Commorragh geholfen hat?"

languages.text: [说谎]“你还在因为独角打断了你的审判而愤愤不平吗，纳札骸？你真的打算违背独角的意愿，让狂风阴谋团替你干脏活吗？毕竟，正是他帮助玛拉斋逃出了科摩罗。”
languages.original_text: [Lie] "Still smarting from the Arebennian interrupting your trial, Nazrakhei? Are you making the Reaving Tempest do your dirty work and go against the Arebennian's will, even though it was he who helped Marazhai escape Commorragh?"

traits.locale_text: [说谎]“你还在因为独角打断了你的审判而愤愤不平吗，纳札骸？你真的打算违背独角的意愿，让狂风阴谋团替你干脏活吗？毕竟，正是他帮助玛拉斋逃出了科摩罗。”

languages.text: [Mentir] « Toujours furieux que l'Arebennian ait interrompu votre procès, Nazrakhei ? Vous utilisez la Tempête ravageuse pour vos basses besognes, contre la volonté de l'Arebennian, même si c'est lui qui a aidé Marazhai à fuir Commorragh ? »
languages.original_text: [Lie] "Still smarting from the Arebennian interrupting your trial, Nazrakhei? Are you making the Reaving Tempest do your dirty work and go against the Arebennian's will, even though it was he who helped Marazhai escape Commorragh?"

traits.locale_text: [Mentir] "Toujours furieux que l'arebennian ait interrompu votre procès, Nazrakhei ?  Vous utilisez la Tempête ravageuse pour vos basses besognes, contre la volonté de l'arebennian, même si c'est lui qui a aidé Marazhai à fuir Commorragh ? »

languages.text: [Mentir] «¿Te sigue doliendo que el Arebennian interrumpiera tu juicio, Nazrakhei? ¿Y ahora haces que la Tempestad Asoladora te haga el trabajo sucio en contra de la voluntad del Arebennian, que fue quien ayudó a Marazhai a escapar de Commorragh?».
languages.original_text: [Lie] "Still smarting from the Arebennian interrupting your trial, Nazrakhei? Are you making the Reaving Tempest do your dirty work and go against the Arebennian's will, even though it was he who helped Marazhai escape Commorragh?"

traits.locale_text: [Mentir] «¿Te sigue doliendo que el Arebennian interrumpiera tu juicio, Nazrakhei? ¿Y ahora haces que la Tempestad Asoladora te haga el trabajo sucio en contra de la voluntad del Arebennian, que fue quien ayudó a Marazhai a escapar de Commorragh?».

languages.text: [嘘をつく]「アーベニアンがお前の裁判を妨害したことをまだ怒っているのか、ナズラクヘイ？お前は略奪の嵐に汚い仕事をさせて、アーベニアンの意志に背こうとしているのか？たとえ、マラズハイがコモラフから逃げ出す手助けをしたのが彼だったとしても？」
languages.original_text: [Lie] "Still smarting from the Arebennian interrupting your trial, Nazrakhei? Are you making the Reaving Tempest do your dirty work and go against the Arebennian's will, even though it was he who helped Marazhai escape Commorragh?"

traits.locale_text: [嘘をつく]「アーベニアンがお前の裁判を妨害したことをまだ怒っているのか、ナズラクヘイ？お前は略奪の嵐に汚い仕事をさせて、アーベニアンの意志に背こうとしているのか？たとえ、マラズハイがコモラフから逃げ出す手助けをしたのが彼だったとしても？」

languages.text: [Yalan söyle] "Hâlâ Arebennian'ın mahkemeni bölmesinin acısını mı yaşıyorsun Nazrakhei? Arebennian, Marazhai'ın Commorragh'tan kaçmasına yardım etmişken onun iradesine karşı gelip Müfteris Kasırga'ya pis işlerini mi yaptırıyorsun?.."
languages.original_text: [Lie] "Still smarting from the Arebennian interrupting your trial, Nazrakhei? Are you making the Reaving Tempest do your dirty work and go against the Arebennian's will, even though it was he who helped Marazhai escape Commorragh?"

traits.locale_text: [Yalan söyle] "Arebennian'ın mahkemeni bölmesinin acısını mı yaşıyorsun hâlâ Nazrakhei? Müfteris Kasırga'ya pis işlerini yaptırıp, Arebennian'ın iradesine onların karşı gelmesini sağlıyorsun ha? Marazhai'ın Commorragh'tan kaçmasına yardım eden o olmasına rağmen?"
